p: The individual components were quantified using the relative area percentage according to the internal normalization method (ISO 7609:1985 [ 93]). They were identified by comparison of their Kovats retention index calculated using cochromatographed standard hydrocarbons relative to C6-C30 n-alkanes and mass spectra, with reference samples and those of the computer libraries (NIST 14, Wiley 10, and Chromessence library built through standards injection) and available data in the literature [ 94].
